timeline.bodyText:
As far as I remember sorting by id is not recommended due to performance considerations: "The _id field has a unique value per document but it is not recommended to use it as a tiebreaker directly" https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/6.8/search-request-search-after.html.
I think sorting by timestamp shall be enough?
timeline.author: mzueva

replies.bodyText: Two fields is used here to have unique value from pair. Here I try to resolve problem when two messages can be acquired at the same time. But indeed we should get rid of using _id as  tiebreaker, now ingest pipeline creates second field event_id to use it instead of _id
replies.author: SilinPavel

timeline.bodyText: Please, check usage of final here and below
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.message: (issue #989) use final where it is possible
GUI System logs: date locale fix
(issue #989) use event_id as second field for searchAfter instead of _id
